title: Our Team
description: At NovaNest, we believe success isn’t just about great ideas — it’s about the synergy of people who bring energy, experience, and belief in the future together.
Our team is a blend of mentors, core members, and Trainees , united by a shared passion for growth, innovation, and impact.
We believe that when the knowledge, experience, and connections of mentors combine with the creativity, energy, and innovation of the new generation, the best results happen.
That’s the essence of our motto:
Synergy of Energy — the power of collaboration that shapes a better future.
Our vision is simple yet powerful:
Empowering young entrepreneurs to grow, innovate, and make an impact.
At NovaNest, we value diversity, learning, and teamwork. Every idea, every voice, and every effort contributes to the collective success that defines who we are.

people.name: Rasoul Moradimehr
about: With a PhD in hand and a heart set on innovation, I’ve spent the past decade building bridges between ideas and execution. My journey began in the vibrant startup ecosystems of Canada, where I discovered my passion for mentoring emerging entrepreneurs and guiding them through the maze of business development. As the Chief of the Board at NovaNest Venture, I’ve had the privilege of working alongside visionary founders, helping them shape scalable ventures through strategic planning and venture capital insights. My professional path is rooted in collaboration, and I thrive in environments where teamwork fuels transformation.

Beyond boardrooms and pitch decks, I’m deeply invested in the human side of entrepreneurship. I believe that great businesses are built not just on brilliant ideas, but on resilient people. Whether I’m hosting mentorship sessions, exploring new investment opportunities, or brainstorming with startup teams, I bring a mix of curiosity, empathy, and strategic thinking to the table. Based in Vancouver, I find inspiration in the city’s dynamic energy and multicultural spirit. My interests—mentoring, entrepreneurship, investment, and teamwork—aren’t just buzzwords; they’re the pillars of my daily life and the compass that guides my career.
